reviews.comments: Great apartment to explore Berlin; it's close to the metro (10 mins walk) which can take you anywhere in the city. 3 grocery stores and a few small restaurants in the area will provide you with anything you need. The apartment itself is not that big, however it will do for around 6 people. We were with 9 here and that's not really recommended, theres little space and the kitchen and facilities are simply not built for it in our opinion. Overall great apartment if you want to explore Berlin on a budget!
It was nice communicating with Alex, I would like to thank him for that. The space was big enough and well-located. This was our first airbnb experience and a good one.

The neighborhood has a working-class immigrant type population. It is quiet and although the following block to the metro station is a bit rundown it seemed safe and we had no problem returning late.
The apartment is spacious for the price, but not very functional for  a family. The WC is in a very small space and shower in the adjacent kitchen. This was indicated, but we imagined something different. Our fault, not the description.
It is probably best suited for a group of friends.
The host was very nice and helpful and we appreciated his help. WE still enjoyed the stay in Berlin! Thanks!
Great apartment in a good location ! A bit surprising at the beginning but it was perfect for 9 people. I truly recommand  this place.
We are enjoy this apartment , thank you )
The location was great, S-Bahn and U-Bahn stations are just couple minutes from the apartment. Alex was very nice and tried to help us as much as he could. The apartment was also great :)

The apartment was very nice and spacious. The public transportation was just behind the corner and made traveling through the city very comfortable, even through late hours. Overall we were very pleased with what Alex' apartment had to offer.
Alex was very helpful and check-in/check-out was very easy. The house worked great for me and my 6 friends. Neighborhood was a little odd but good location and close to the metro.

A really nice appartment with a big livingroom. The couches convert into double beds so plenty room for our group to sleep comfortably. The kitchen is well equipped to cook for large groups. The train and supermarket are really close as well.

Our stay with Alex was great. The flat was very spacious and clean. We got to Berlin late, and Alex was very accommodating and left the keys with a small internet shop. One thing to note, the shower is inside the kitchen which can be separated by a curtain. We didn't have a problem with it though.
Everything is fine. The flat is big for five people. Happy to stay here

The apartment was clean, very nice and well organized. Atypical and warm ar the two words that come to my mind when I think about it. The neighborhood is nice and easily accessible by public transport. Quite close to all nice places to visit in Berlin. Alex was compliant for the keys and the arrival and departure times. So we recommend this place!
Alex was so nice and the apartment was perfect

Alex is an amazing host! He let us leave our stuff at the flat earlier than we originally were supposed to check in. The flat was matching the description. Everything was great and we had an amazing time. The transport links from the flat are really good, the shop is just couple of minutes walk and there is an amazing spa just 3km from it.

we like this apartment, got everything ready and close to center, very convenience to go round. not far from the bus station and the subway.

hope next time, not for business, only for travel and will go back to you! :-)

The appartment was exactly what we needed. More than enough space for four people. It can even fit more! 

There were three suppermarkets near by, not more than a five minute walk away what was wonderfull. 

You were in no-time in the hart of the city because the good metro/bus network in Berlin.

The apartment was nice and accommodated my big family (2 adults/6 kids).   It was conveniently located near both U-bahn / S-bahn stations.  Alex was easily accessible via text and offered both ideas for sightseeing and eating.  Overall, a very positive experience.

Cute apartment if you're coming to Berlin for a short time. Wouldn't necessarily recommend it for more than 7 ppl cause there's only 1 restroom and the shower is in the kitchen which is hilarious but gets annoying if someone's cooking while you're showering and you come out smelling like eggs Benedict. Otherwise , Alex is awesome and did his max to facilitate our late arrival. Many thanks for that.
The flat is great ! It's clean, cozy and the location is quite convenient! I haven't seen Alex in person, but he is very helpful.

It was a pleasure to enter into this flat. It was spacious and so interesting!! We were so excited to get to stay there. The location was great- really close to grocery, and public transport. Alex was really helpful and kind. If we come back to Berlin we would check to see if this flat was available again!

The flat is in a quiet part of town but very convenient for access to the old East Berlin with its trendy coffee shops and restaurants. Everything was 15-20 mins away. There are 2 supermarkets nearby and a nice park for a stroll or morning run.

The whole experience was absolutely fantastic! Alex was fantastic to communicate with and organised everything perfectly. The apartment was wonderful, clean and comfortable. When in need for an extra set of keys, Alex organised for them to be dropped off very quickly and gave us tips as to what to do in the area. Five stars from me, would definitely stay again!
We are really glad. It is great place in Berlin - very closed to U-bahn, in flat you have everything you need. No problems with Alex, very good contact. I recomend this place.

Alex was very responsive, his flat was exactly what we were looking for. Spacious, welcoming, a bit quirky, convenient enough for us.
We felt welcome, Alex was helpful, and it became a real house for the few days that we spent in Berlin. We'll take it again should we want/need to come back.
A special experience in this apartment. Clean and nice decoration. We had a good time.

Really nice stay. The apartment is very small even though there is room for 9 people. So if you dont mind living close to each other it is a great apartment. It is easy to get to Mitte, but there was not that many shops in our area in wedding, as we hoped. But we were happy to live there.

Everything was clean and nice when we arrived. Bedding and essentials were prepared for us so that we didn't need to take care of anything. 
Furthermore, Alex was very flexible in terms of scheduling and was eager to answer quickly and precisely to all of my questions.
The place is able to accommodate at least 8 people providing a very comfy and cozy situation. 
At the bottom line I can totally recommend this place! Thank you Alex!
The apartment is very well situated, Alex is very friendly. He answered us quickly and we had all we need.
We had a very nice stay at the Gerichtstrasse. We had everything we needed and it was a very spacious. Perfect for a trip to Berlin with friends or family.

The apartment was beautiful, the heater was already on when we arrived, it immediatly felt very comfortable! It was very easy to communicate with Alex, he responded very quickly and he was helpful. I would definitely recommend this place! Thanks Alex for your care and fast responses.
Best,
Jeske

Everything was just as indicated, the sofa beds had even been made already.  Although we didn't meet him in person, Alex was friendly and always communicated promptly.  Arriving late in the evening was no problem, as he arranged for us to pick up the key nearby.  The shower in the kitchen took some getting used to, but it matched the general quirkiness of the place.

Very nice appartment, lot of space, very nice place to stay.
Quiet neigbourhood.
Place very close to at least 2 tram, metro station.

Alex was kind and very helpful.
We didn't meet him in person but we didn't have any problem with check in or check out. Alex responded very quickly for my messages.
Flat is big and fully equipped. Neighborhood is decent. Apartment is placed very close to the centrum (a few mins walk from the U- bahn and S- bahn).

The flat nicely suited our needs: big enough for 7 people, easy to find, close to public transportation. 
We didn't spend a lot of time in the flat as we wanted to fully discover Berlin.
Even if we didn't meet Alex, he was reactive and always answer our questions.
Great, clean and spacious apartment, which is located close to the subway station in Wedding. Alex was a very helpful, responsive and thoughtful host.

Alice in the Wonderland meets Ron Weasley's house. 
The place is spacious and well equipped. Alex is responsive and friendly (we did not see him in person).
Crazy inner room layout. Shower in kitchen which is two levels below bedrooms. 
We got used to it. 
We also got used to the stuffed birds decor...
We did not get used to the spooky neighborhood, the drunks on the windows and the non stop noise.

Almost center of Berlin! Nice apartment at low price.
Alex was helpful. :)

Spacious, clean, Alex was very helpful.
Good place in Berlin in the Wedding district.

We didn't Meet Alex the Host in person, but he was very friendly in the text messages graciously accommodating us for early check in , he also made key collection and check out very easy. The area isn't 'perfectly' situated but it is only a 5 minute walk to the Metro. Free Street parking for our rental car was a Big plus! The Accommodation itself was a really interesting layout and Décor was nice and Quirky, we really enjoyed our time there.

we have very happy time in here
many bus and subway station is near by house and theres many bed and room
thank you for alex!!!

It is located in Wedding Berlin. You can park your car near by. 
The host is very thought and easy to communicate.
Nice appartment and very smooth key pickup! It's located close to a subway station. All in all everything was fine!
The house was spacious and clean, and has a very young spirit. Alex was a great host, all good!
The apartment is near to subway. Bathroom is small but it is not problem.

Apartment is good enough, close to S-bahn for a quick ride to Berlin center, decent neighborhood. However it also suffered some easy to fix shortcomings like: only 5 chairs for 8 people, broken showerstand, not cleaned very well, no lock on toilet.

Great apartment and very near to the s bahn so traveling in and out of the city was easy! Alex was a great host and let us add extra guests at a later date which was very helpful. Near two supermarkets and a lovely park with outdoor pool. As nine students we fit nicely, although the shower in the kitchen was slightly awkward there was still nothing to complain about! I would definitely come back!
Alex was very polite and nice. Quick to respond and arranged a very smooth key drop for us to come and pick up the key whenever we wanted to. Everything was fine.
Alex did not meet us directly but we retrieved the key from a nearby shop. The place was great and spacious.

Alex was great at the communication since the day one. We were quite a big group staying at the apt and he made us all feel very welcome. The location was absolutely fantastic very close to the center a few mins walk from the U- bahn and S- bahn which made getting around Berlin a lot easier. Definitely recommending this place to bigger groups, we had a reunion and the common area was a great advantage of this place.

Alex's place was easy to find and convenient located at Wedding S-Bahn and U-bahn. The rooms were clean and cosy, we had a good night's rest. He was also nice enough to come by to open the gate, to allow us to drop out suitcases off in the hall earlier than the check-in time. The only downside was the toilet which was small but that wasn't much of a problem either. Overall a very wonderful stay at this uniquely decorated apartment!
